alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 7:35PM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH. * WHERE...East Platte County, South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Blowing snow could reduce visibility to under one mile at times. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Blowing snow could lead to visibility reductions and hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
